name: Rage Power: Animal Fury
description: While raging you gain a bite attack. The bite attack is made at your normal base attack bonus -5 and deals 1d4 damage (or 1d3 if you are small) plus half your Strength modifier.

name: Rage Power: Clear Mind
description: Once per rage you may reroll a Will save as an immediate action after the first save is attempted, but before the results are revealed by the GM.

name: Rage Power: Fearless Rage
description: While raging you are immune to the shaken and frightened conditions.

name: Rage Power: Guarded Stance
description: You gain a +1 dodge bonus against melee attacks for a number of rounds equal to your current Constitution modifier (minimum 1), +1 round for every 6 levels you have attained.

name: Rage Power: Increased Damage Reduction
description: Your damage reduction increases by 1/- whenever you are raging. May be selected up to three times, the effect stacks with itself.

name: Rage Power: Internal Fortitude
description: While raging you are immune to the sickened and nauseated conditions.

name: Rage Power: Intimidating Glare
description: You can make an Intimidate check against one adjacent enemy as a move action, if successful the opponent is shaken for 1d4 rounds + 1 round for every 5 poiints by which your check exceeds the DC.

name: Rage Power: Knockback
description: Once per round you may make a bull rush attempt against one target in place of a melee attack. If successful, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier and is smoved back as normal.

name: Rage Power: Low-Light Vision
description: You gain low-light vision while raging.

name: Rage Power: Mighty Swing
description: Once per rage you may automatically confirm a critical hit as an immediate action once a critical threat has been determined.

name: Rage Power: Moment of Clarity
description: Once per rage you may choose to take any of the benefits or penalties from raging for 1 round. Activate as a swift action. This round still counts towards the total number of hours spent raging for the day.

name: Rage Power: Night Vision
description: You gain darkvision 60 feet while raging. Must have low-light vision as a racial trait or rage power to take this.

name: Rage Power: No Escape
description: Once per rage when an adjacent foe uses a withdraw action to move away from you, you may move up to double your base speed as an immediate action. You must end this movement next to the withdrawing target, and you provoke attacks of opportunity as normal.

name: Rage Power: Powerful Blow
description: Once per rage as a swift action you may gain a +1 bonus on a single damage roll, increasing by an additional +1 for every 4 levels you have attained.

name: Rage Power: Quick Reflexes
description: While raging you may make one additional attack of opportunity per round

name: Rage Power: Raging Climber
description: While raging you add your level as an enhancement bonus on all Climb skill checks

name: Rage Power: Raging Leaper
description: While raging you add your level as an enhancement bonus on all Acrobatics skill checks made to jump. While making a check this way you are always considered to have a running start.

name: Rage Power: Raging Swimmer
description: While raging you add your level as an enhancement bonus on all Swim skill checks.

name: Rage Power: Renewed Vigor
description: Once per day as a standard action you heal 1d8 points of damage + your Constitution modifier. Heal an additional 1d8 of damage for every 4 levels attained after the 4th, up to 5d8 at level 20.

name: Rage Power: Rolling Dodge
description: As a move action you may gain a +1 dodge bonus to your Armor Class against ranged attacks for a nuumber of rounds equal to your current Constitution modifier (minimum 1). Activating this ability does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

name: Rage Power: Roused Anger
description: You may enter a rage even if fatigued. You are immune to the fatigued condition while raging after activating this ability. Once the rage ends you are exhausted for 10 minutes per round spent raging.

name: Rage Power: Scent
description: You gain the scent ability while raging and may use this ability to locate unseen foes.

name: Rage Power: Strength Surge
description: Once per rage as an immediate action youu add your barbarian level to one Strength check or combat maneuver check or Combat Maneuver Defense.

name: Rage Power: Superstition
description: You gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws made to resist spells, supernatural abilities, and spell-like abilities. This bonus increases by +1 for every 4 levels you have attained. While raging you may not be the willing target of any spell and must make saving throws to resist all spells, even those cast by allies.

name: Rage Power: Surprise Accuracy
description: Once per rage as a swift action you may gain a +1 morale bonus on one attack roll. This bonus increases by +1 for every 4 levels you have attained. Must be activated before the roll to hit is made.

name: Rage Power: Swift Foot
description: You gain a 5-foot enhancement bonus to base speed whenever you are raging. You may select this power up to three times, the effect stacks with itself.

name: Rage Power: Terrifying Howl
description: As a standard action you may unleash a terrifying howl. All shaken enemies within 30 feet must make a Will save (DC equal to 10 + 1/2 your level + your Strength modifier) or be panicked for 1d4+1 rounds. Once an enemy has made a save against terrifying howl (successful or not) they are immune to this power for 24 hours.

name: Rage Power: Unexpected Strike
description: Once per rage you may make an attack of opportunity against a foe that moves into any square you are threatening, regardless of whether that movement normally provokes attacks of opportunity.

name: Air Domain
description: You can manipulate lightning, mist, and wind, traffic with air creatures, and are resistant to electricity damage.

name: Animal Domain
description: You can speak with and befriend animals with ease, in addition treat Knowledge(nature) as a class skill.

name: Artifice Domain
description: You can repair damage to objects, animate objects with life, and create objects from nothing.

name: Chaos Domain
description: Your touch infuses life and weapons with chaos, and you revel in all things anarchic.

name: Charm Domain
description: You can baffle and befuddle foes with a touch or smile, and your beauty and grace are divine.

name: Community Domain
description: Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds.

name: Darkness Domain
description: You manipulate shadows and darkness, in additioin receiv Blind-Flight as a bonus feat.

name: Death Domain
description: You can cause the living to bleed at a touch, and find comfort in the presence of the dead.

name: Destruction Domain
description: You revel in ruin and devastation, and can deliver particularly destructive attacks.

name: Earth Domain
description: You have mastery over earth, metal, and stone, and can fire darts of acid, and command earth creatures.

name: Evil Domain
description: You are sinister and cruel, aand have wholly pledged your soul to the cause of evil.

name: Fire Domain
description: You can call forth fire, command creatures of the inferno, and your flesh does not burn.

name: Glory Domain
description: You are infused with the glory of the divine, and are a true foe of the undead, in addition when you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures the DC to halve the damage is increased by 2.

name: Good Domain
description: You have pledged your life and soul to goodness and purity.

name: Healing Domain
description: Your touch staves off pain and death, and your healing magic is particularly vital and potent.

name: Knowledge Domain
description: You are a scholar and a sage of legends, in addition treat all Knowledge skills as class skills.

name: Law Domain
description: You follow a strict and ordered code of laws, and in so doing achieve enlightenment.

name: Liberation Domain
description: You are a spirit of freedom and a staunch foe against all who would enslave and oppress.

name: Luck Domain
description: You are infused with luck and your mere presence can spread good fortune.

name: Madness Domain
description: You embrace the madness that lurks deep in your heart, and can unleash it to drive your foes insane or to sacrifice certain abilities to hone others.

name: Magic Domain
description: You are a true student of all things mystical, and see divinity in the purity of magic.

name: Nobility Domain
description: You are a great leader, an inspiration to all who follow the teachings of your faith.

name: Plant Domain
description: You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.

name: Protection Domain
description: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.

name: Repose Domain
description: You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear.

name: Rune Domain
description: In strange and eldritch runes you find potent magic. You gain Scribe Scroll as a bonus feat.

name: Strength Domain
description: In strength and brawn there is truth - your faith gives you incredible might and power.

name: Sun Domain
description: You see truth in the pure and burniing light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.

name: Travel Domain
description: You are an explorer and find enlightenment in the simple joy of travel, be it by foot or conveyance or magic. Increase your base speed by 10 feet.

name: Trickery Domain
description: You are a master of illusions and deceptions. Bluff, Disguise, and Stealth are class skills.

name: War Domain
description: You are a crusader for your god, always ready and willing to fight to defend your faith.

name: Water Domain
description: You can manipulate water and mist and ice, conjure creatures of water, and resist cold.

name: Weather Domain
description: With power over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.

Hunter's Bond: Companions
description: You may spend a move action to grant half of your favored enemy bonus against a single target of the appropriate type to all allies within 30 feet. This bonus lasts a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1)

name: Hunter's Bond: Animal Companion
description: Select a loyal animal companion

name: Rogue Talent: Bleeding Attack
description: You may cause a living opponent to bleed after being hit by a sneak attack. Bleeding creatures take 1 point of damage each round at the start of their turn for each die of the rogue's sneak attack. Bleeding can be stopped by a DC15 Heal check or the application of any affect that heals damage. Bleeding from this affect does not stack with itself. Bleeding bypasses all damage reduction. Only one talent may be used with each Sneak Attack.

name: Rogue Talent: Combat Trick
description: Select a bonus combat Feat

name: Rogue Talent: Fast Stealth
description: You may move at full speed while using the Stealth skill without penalty.

name: Rogue Talent: Finesse Rogue
description: Gain the Weapon Finesse bonus feat

name: Rogue Talent: Ledge Walker
description: You may move along narrow surfaces at full speed using the Acrobatics skill without penalty. You are not flat-footed when using Acrobatics to move along narrow surfaces.

name: Rogue Talent: Major Magic
description: You may cast a 1st level spell from the Sorcerer/Wizard spell list two times per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability is your Rogue level. The save DC for this spell is 11 + your Intelligence modifier. You must have an Intelligence of at least 11 to select this talent and the Minor Magic talent.

name: Rogue Talent: Minor Magic
description: You may cast a 0-level spell from the Sorcerer/Wizard spell list three times per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability is your Rogue level. The save DC for this spell is 10 + your Intelligence modifier. You must have an Intelligence of at least 10 to select this talent and the Minor Magic talent.

name: Rogue Talent: Quick Disable
description: It takes you half as long to disable a trap using the Disable Device skill (minimum 1 round).

name: Rogue Talent: Resiliency
description: Once per day you can gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your Rogue level to prevent yourself from dying. Activating this ability is an immediate action that can only be used when below 0 hit points. These hit points last for 1 minute. If your hit points drop below 0 due to the loss of these temporary hit points you fall unconscious and are dying as normal.

name: Rogue Talent: Rogue Crawl
description: While prone you move at half speed. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity as normal. You may take a 5-foot step while crawling.

name: Rogue Talent: Slow Reactions
description: Enemies damaged by your Sneak Attack can't make attacks of opportunity for 1 round. Only one talent may be used with each Sneak Attack.

name: Rogue Talent: Stand Up
description: You may stand up from prone as a free action. This movement still provokes attacks of opportunity when threatened by an enemy.

name: Rogue Talent: Surprise Attack
description: During the surprise round enemies are always considered flat-footed.

name: Rogue Talent: Trap Spotter
description: Whenever you come within 10 feet of a trap you receive an immediate Perception skill check to notice the trap. The GM should make this check in secret.

name: Rogue Talent: Weapon Training
description: You gain Weapon Focus as a bonus feat.

name: Rogue Talent: Crippling Strike
description: Your Sneak Attack also deals 2 points of Strength damage. Only one talent may be used with each Sneak Attack.

name: Rogue Talent: Defensive Roll
description: Once per day if you would be reduced to 0 or fewer hit points by combat damage (by a weapon attack or other blow) you may attempt to roll with the damage. To use this ability attempt a Reflex saving throw (DC = damage dealt). If the save succeeds you take only half damage; if it fails you take full damage. You must be aware of the attack and able to react to it and able to use your Dexterity bonus to AC.

name: Rogue Talent: Dispelling Attack
description: Opponents dealt damage by your Sneak Attack are affected by a targeted dispel magic effect. This removes the lowest level spell effect on the target. The caster level for this ability is equal to your Rogue level. You must have the Major Magic talent to choose this talent. Only one talent may be used with each Sneak Attack.

name: Rogue Talent: Improved Evasion
description: You take half damage on failed Reflex saves (only when not helpless).

name: Rogue Talent: Opportunist
description: Once per round you may make an attack of opportunity against an opponent who has just been struck for damage in melee by another character. This attack counts as an attack of opportunity for that round. Even if you have the Combat Reflexes feat you may only use this once per round.

name: Rogue Talent: Skill Mastery
description: Select a number of skills equal to 3+ your Intelligence modifier. When making aa skill check with one of these skills you may take a 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent you from doing so. You may select this talent multiple times and select additional skills each time.

name: Rogue Talent: Slippery Mind
description: If you fail a saving throw against an Enchantment spell or effect you may attempt it again 1 round later with the same DC. You get only one extra chance.

name: Rogue Talent: Feat
description: You may select a bonus feat.

name: Bloodline: Aberrant
description: There is a taint in your blood, one that is alien and bizarre. You tend to think in odd ways, approaching problems from an angle most would not expect. Over time, this taint manifests in your physical form.

name: Bloodline: Abyssal
description: Generations ago, a demon spread its filth into your heritage. While it does not manifest in all of your kin, for you it is particularly strong. You might sometimes have urges to chaos or evil, but your destiny (and alignment) is up to you

name: Bloodline: Arcane
description: Your family has always been skilled in the eldritch art of magic. While many of your relatives were accomplished wizards, your powers developed without the need for study and practice.

name: Bloodline: Celestial
description: Your bloodline is blessed by a celestial power, either from a celestial ancestor or through divine intervention. Although this power drives you along the path of good, your fate (and alignment) is your own to determine.

name: Bloodline: Destined
description: Your family is destined for greatness iin some way. Your birth could have been foretold in prophecy, or perhaps it occured during an especially auspicious event, such as a solar eclipse. Regardless of your bloodline's origin, you have a great future ahead.

name: Bloodline: Draconic
description: At some point in your family's history, a dragon interbred with your bloodline, and now its ancient power flows through your veins.

name: Bloodline: Elemental
description: The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your famiily history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force.

name: Bloodline: Fey
description: The capricious nature of the fey runs in your family due to some intermingling of fey blood or magic. You are more emotional than most, prone to bouts of joy and rage.

name: Bloodline: Infernal
description: Somewhere in your family's history, a relative made a deal with a devil, and that pact has influenced your family line every since. In you, it manifests in direct and obvious ways, granting you powers and abilities. While your fate is still your own, you can't help but wonder if your ultimate reward is bound to the Pit.

name: Bloodline: Undead
description: The taint of the grave runs through your family. Perhaps one of your ancestors became a powerful lich or vampire, or maybe you were born dead before suddenly returning to life. Either way, the forces of death move through you and touch your every action.
